1. This calculator is used to find the unknowns in a compound savings.
2. There 5 options in the dropdown list(Left to Clear Button).

3. To clear a field click the clear button once.
4. If you click the clear Button twice, it will clear all the entries.

5. This calculator calculates based on mounthly compunding.
6. Enter the number of periods in years.
7. Enter the Annual interest rate in percentage.
